title: Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram - The Vaibhavam Necklace
features: This stunning Grand Haaram showcases a unique linear diamond arrangement culminating in an exquisitely crafted pendant. The pendant is intricately designed with floral and paisley motifs, embellished with dazzling diamonds, vibrant emeralds and hints of ruby. The design incorporates traditional South Indian elements with a modern, geometric layout.
occasions: and other special occasions where you want to make a statement. Perfect for Muhurtham.
description: This Grand Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. Its unique design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibility. The brilliance of the diamonds, the vibrancy of the emeralds, and the Hyderabadi polish make it a truly remarkable piece. Own a treasure that will be cherished for generations to come.
